entry.content:

entry.title: TAMIL FLASHCARD SET
entry.summary: Thank you for your overwhelming response!! We are SOLD OUT!!! This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards…
entry.content:
Thank you for your overwhelming response!!

We are SOLD OUT!!!

This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards which includes

  • Uyir ezhuthukkal
  • Mei ezhuthukkal 
  • UyirMei ezhuthukkal (First series)

SHIPPING ONLY ON THURSDAYS. ALL THE ORDERS WILL BE SORTED AND DESPATCHED FROM 15TH MARCH 2021.

**********PRE-ORDERS ONLY**************

Printed in 300 GSM matte paper.

Card size: 9 * 13 cms

To purchase our Flashcards , please pay through below link:

entry.content:
Happy to share the "Letter of the week Tamil" series with you all. We from Tamiltoddlers team will be sharing some of the ideas which you can make use for teaching your children.

Here’s what you can expect Letter of the Week Tamil :

  • Hands on activity ideas
  • YouTube videos and explanations of works


Make sure you have subscribed to my YouTube channel www.youtube.com/c/Tamiltoddlers for  fun activities.

entry.content:
Hi,

I've gone through the draft by government and tried to prepare a syllabus for Tamil which can help you and your little ones :)

Please provide the link to download for people who want it , instead of just sharing it.

Tamil KG syllabus

Thank you. 

Happy Learning :)
